title: Galangal and Lime Leaf Chicken Consommé with Rice Noodle Nest

ingredients.item: main protein or veg, prepared (see title)
mixed vegetables suited to the dish
handful fresh herbs (coriander, Thai basil, mint)

method: Build a flavour base: warm the oil gently, then sweat garlic, ginger, and lemongrass until aromatic, without colouring.
Layer seasoning: add aromatics, citrus, and umami, then reduce to concentrate flavour.
Cook the main element precisely: sear or poach to target doneness, resting where appropriate.
Balance with lime, a touch of sweetness, and salt until bright and savoury.
Plate cleanly: sauce first, main element centred, herbs and pickles last for lift.
swaps: Swap rice for brown rice if you prefer.
For milder heat, remove chilli seeds and use less paste.
For vegetarian versions, use tofu and soy sauce instead of fish sauce.
plating: Keep herbs dry and cold so they stay vivid.
Add pickles at the end so acidity stays sharp.
Finish with a few drops of herb oil for aroma.
notes: Uses extra virgin olive oil, coconut oil, or avocado oil only. No seed oils.
hydrationTip: Aim for 300–500 ml water with your meal, more if it is spicy.
